DOC.brief_summary: Cubital tunnel syndrome cause compression ulnar nerve elbow . This lead symptom chronic hand weakness , numbness pain . This usually treated surgical procedure nerve decompress . Research show nerve simulator speed recovery nerve follow injury . The purpose research examine difference patient outcome nerve decompression surgery without nerve stimulation . Our research question : What differences long term functional outcome patient ulnar nerve decompression surgery without nerve stimulation ?
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Patients see University Chicago clinic , diagnose Cubital Tunnel Syndrome , approach enrol study 2 . If fit inclusion exclusion criterion , fail conservative management , consent part study , schedule Cubital Tunnel Surgery randomize intervention/non-intervention group 3 . Patients pre-operative subjective pain upper extremity function survey objective hand strength/sensation measurement do blind Occupational Therapist University Chicago Occupational Therapy Clinic . Patient also pre-operative EMG do . 4 . Patient discharge follow surgery follow 6 week , 3 month , 6 month , 12 month . EMG do 3 month outcome measurement ( Pain score , PRUNE evaluation , QuickDash Questionnaire , Michigan hand Questionnaire , grip strength , sensation measurement ) take postoperative visit blind occupational therapist 5 . Data compare pre postoperatively
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion EMG confirm ulnar nerve neuropathy cubital tunnel without symptom : Paresthesia numbness small finger and/or ring finger Complaints hand weakness Exam show positive flexion compression test elbow and/or positive tinel 's sign cubital tunnel Failed conservative management 6 week ○ Has complete combination 6 week still symptom Night splint 4560 degree flexion forearm neutral Padding elbow elbow pad day Daily NSAIDs able take Cubital tunnel steroid injection Age restriction : 1865years old Exclusion criterion Psychiatric condition Workman 's compensation patient Neurologic condition ( ex . MS ) Inflammatory rheumatologic condition ( Connective tissue disease , RA… etc ) Associated elbow upper extremity fracture Previous Cubital Tunnel Surgeries Previous CSpine Surgeries Pregnancy
